name: alluxio
description:
Alluxio (formerly known as Tachyon) is a virtual distributed storage
system. It bridges the gap between computation frameworks and storage
systems, enabling computation applications to connect to numerous
storage systems through a common interface.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
Binary distribution of the IBM Java Software Development Kit for big and
little-endian powerpc (power7, 8 and 9). Note: IBM is fairly aggressive
about taking down old versions, so old (and even current) versions may
not be available.
